document_data.mainbody: '''Keldar of the Forest''' was a [[Human]] male [[priest]] of [[Silvanus]] who lived in the [[village]] of [[Dragon Falls (village)|Dragon Falls]] in [[the Vast]].
document_data.History:
Keldar was a member of the band of [[adventurer]]s that slew the [[red dragon]] [[Halarglautha Firewings]], who once rampaged across the Vast. Keldar and the survivors took possession of the dragon's hoard of coins and decided to settle near the location of her lair, [[Dragon Falls (waterfall)|the Dragon Falls waterfall]]. They constructed themselves a stronghold and the village of Dragons Fall grew around them over four generations.

By [[1370 DR]], Keldar was still living at the stronghold, though it was under new ownership and operating as the [[Inn of the Dragon]].
document_data.Activities:
Keldar was Dragon Falls's resident priest.

He maintained a [[shrine]] to Silvanus that stood at the head of the falls though he more often ignored it.
